attributes.action: Investigate the FA with respect to the contrasts of punishments between Premier league and Football league clubs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The FA have what would appear to be an agenda when it comes to dealing with clubs from the football league who throw little finacial clout.
In my opinion the FA is an institution of jobs for the boys and the true enemy of football fans.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Investigate the FA with respect to the contrasts of punishments between Premier league and Football league clubs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16844


Prime Minister's Office
